wrongColorUsage:
<size=45>✘</size>
<size=18>Wrong color format!</size>
You need to use RBGA color code with percentage value type. 

 Example: 0.16 0.34 0.49 1.0
wrongAnchorUsage:
<size=45>✘</size>
<size=18>Wrong anchor format!</size>
Anchor must contain two values, press '?' for more info. 

 Example: 0.5 0.7
missingCoreValues:
<size=45>✘</size>
<size=18>Missing mandatory values!</size>
 Panel Name, UI Type, Panel Type and Anchors cannot be empty.
tooManyArguments:
<size=45>✘</size>
<size=18>Too many arguments!</size>
 For multiple words please put text between 'quote marks'.

 Keep in mind that Panel Name has to be one word.
panelNameNotFound:
<size=45>✘</size>
<size=18>Panel name was not found!</size>
 You can find all panel names in data file or by typing chat command 

'/custombuttons_list'
changesSaved:
<size=45>✔</size>
<size=18>Changes have been saved!</size>

Click here to continue...
